long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gameplay
"Stumble Guys" has gained popularity for its unique gameplay. Here are the key features of the game:

MultiplayerBattle: Engage in intense battles with other players. In each round, you'll compete against multiple players, vying for the top spot.
Dash and Jump: Dash, jump, and dodge your way through obstacle-filled courses by controlling your character. Find the right balance between speed and balance.
Conquer Obstacles: The game is packed with various obstacles, including rolling giant balls, moving platforms, spinning discs, and more. Overcome these challenges with clever maneuvers and precise jumps to stay ahead.
Power-ups and Traps: Discover fun power-ups and traps that can boost your speed or disrupt other players. Utilize them strategically to gain an advantage.
Diverse Courses: Explore a wide range of unique courses in the game. Each course has its own design and challenges, requiring you to adapt quickly to secure victory.
Customize Your Character: Dress up your character with different costumes and accessories according to your preferences. Showcase your style and stand out from other players.
